bibl.title: Settling a Dispute. Toward a Legal Anthropology of Late Antique Egypt. (New Texts from Ancient Cultures. 1.)
bibl.note: Edition of P. Mich. Inv. 6922 + P. Vatic. Aphrod. 10, a dialysis from Dioscorus' archive (Aphrodito, A.D. 537), with introduction and commentary.
bibl.seg: GAGOS Traianos and Peter VAN MINNEN, Settling a Dispute. Toward a Legal Anthropology of Late Antique Egypt. (New Texts from Ancient Cultures. 1.)
Ann Arbor, The University of Michigan Press, 1994, 8°, x-150 pp., 1 arbre généal., 1 carte et 5 pll. ISBN 0-472-06590-4. $44.50 (hbk) / 24.95 (pbk).
141.4 P. Mich. Inv. 6922 + P. Vatic. Aphrod. 10
